title: AI-Enhanced Mathematical Problem-Solving Project: Strengthening Critical Thinking and Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic math concepts (functions, statistics, etc.) and proficiency with essential digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment utilizing AI tools in mathematical problem-solving, with goals of fostering critical thinking and information literacy

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can manage cognitive fatigue while appropriately utilizing AI tools during mathematical problem-solving
Over 90% of learners can identify error or bias cases by critically evaluating AI-generated results in team projects
Through digital literacy assessments, over 75% of learners can apply criteria for judging information source credibility and ethical use

resources: Access to AI-Powered Math Problem-Solving Tools

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
